name: Keep moving and nobody falls
description:
Help Nina stay on her dream as long as possible! Get the high score in this arcade game inspired on Minesweeper.

* Avoid stepping on a bomb or you will lose a live.

* The number of bombs adjacent to a tile is shown on the tile.

* But be careful! The bombs try to hide by counting themselves in the number they show.

* Score by stepping on tiles with a number, you will obtain as much points as the number on the platform.

* On each level you can obtain a multiplier of points which will be the highest number you have stepped on.

* IMPORTANT: Step on a star platform to make the points collected in that level count!!!
